ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
ISPICKVAL( Current_Step__c , "(5 of 12) Internal Brief of Findings/Concerns")&&
OR( ISBLANK( Number_of_Terms__c ), ISBLANK( Active_EEs_by_ID__c ), ISBLANK( Terminated_EEs_by_ID__c ), ISBLANK( Peak_Volume_Check_Count__c ), ISBLANK( Normal_Number_of_Checks_per_Payroll__c ), ISBLANK (Text( Rate_of_EE_Turnover__c )) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Employee Detail section is required when "Current Step" is selected as " (5 of 12) Internal Brief of Findings/Concerns" Except the field "Number of Active EEs"
